info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 9:28PM CDT until July 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... South central Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... East central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 927 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warren to 5 miles east of Elmer to near Chillicothe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Vernon, Frederick, Snyder, Tipton, Blair, Chillicothe, Olustee, Mountain Park, Indiahoma, Davidson, Manitou, Martha, Elmer, Headrick, Hollister, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Tom Steed Reservoir, and Warren. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
